quotes.quote: Some people feel the rain, others just get wet
quotes.name: - Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Not all those who wander are lost
quotes.name: - J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: A lie can travel halfway around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes
quotes.name: - Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people
quotes.name: - Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall
quotes.name: - Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all
quotes.name: - Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Everything in the universe is within you. Ask all from yourself
quotes.name: - Rumi

quotes.quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant
quotes.name: - Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans
quotes.name: - John Lennon

quotes.quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary
quotes.name: - Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: If not us, who? If not now, when?
quotes.name: - John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Happiness can be found, even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
quotes.name: - J. K. Rowling
